boardgame.name: A Handful of Stars
boardgame.description: A Handful of Stars is the final title published by Treefrog Games and the third entry into the unofficial _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;A Few Acres of Snow Trilogy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; The first game was the two-player A Few Acres of Snow, whose main mechanisms were then reimplemented in the multiplayer Mythotopia, and now A Handful of Stars reimplements the mechanisms from Mythotopia and takes them to the vast reaches of space..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 25: Transatlantic, A Handful of Stars, Rhino Hero: Super Battle, Las Vegas, Bob Ross: Art of Chill Game
Heavy Cardboard Episode 57 – Princes of the Renaissance
WTG6 - Board Game Leftovers Podcast : Arkham Horror LCG and Legends of the American Frontier

listing.notes: Das Spiel ist neu und ungespielt; (OVP / shrink wrapped). Das Spielmaterial ist vollständig; die Verpackung ohne Beschädigungen; (All materials are present, unused and undamaged). Die Versandkosten richten sich nach Gewicht und Versandort und betragen für den Versand innerhalb Deutschland zwischen 6,00 € und 15,00 € - je nach Gewicht und Größe des Pakets. Shipment: The shipment costs are not included. Prices depend on weight and country. I will ship worldwide with DHL. Please ask me for more information before ordering if you want to be sure about the shipping charges. Payment: Payment is possible with Money Order (IBAN and BIC) or PayPal. If you choose PayPal there will be extra costs. Please ask me for more information.
